definition[0]: a document showing a company’s financial position and wealth at a particular time, often the last day of the financial year
definition[1]: a document showing a company’s financial position and wealth at a particular time, often the last day of its financial year
example[1]: The company performed well last year, and has a healthy balance sheet with a good amount of cash.
example[3]: a clean balance sheet (=without debt or without too much debt)
